string-array.name: recipeSteps
string-array.item: Bring water to a boil in large saucepan.
Add the quinoa, stir once, and return to boil.
Cook uncovered over medium heat for 12 minutes.
Strain and rinse well with cold water.
When dry, transfer quinoa to a large bowl.
Add the cucumbers, onion, tomato, parsley, mint, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
